page.title: 18 TRAFFIC AND TRANSPORT
page.content: Several years ago,a{by-pass}was built on the{A.30}so that our town would be less congested,especially at peak holiday time.In spite of this,the town centre still has too much traffic when people are coming into or leaving work.It has been suggested that the {square}should be a{pedestrian precinct with new one-way systems.On a Tuesday, market day,in July 1985,we stood by the{new road lay-out}by the Town Hall and between 9.30 a.m. and 10a.m. we counted 490 vehicles from all routes. Most of them were{market}traffic from the North and West.The market is badly situated in the centre of town and will shortly be moved to Pennygillam. There are{bus stops}in Westgate Street which cause hold- ups when buses park nearly opposite each other. On the way to Holsworthy is a{new road bridge over the River Tamar at Netherbridge.
